item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 13, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Mark Klein, AT&T whistleblower who revealed NSA mass spying, has died (939 points | 199 comments)
2. My teen years: The transputer operating system (82 points | 7 comments)
3. Gemini Robotics (697 points | 411 comments)
4. Practical UX for startups surviving without a designer (178 points | 52 comments)
5. xlskubectl – a spreadsheet to control your Kubernetes cluster (70 points | 25 comments)
6. Show HN: Time Portal – Get dropped into history, guess where you landed (266 points | 138 comments)
7. The DuckDB Local UI (678 points | 150 comments)
8. Iconography of the PuTTY tools (243 points | 60 comments)
9. Switching from Pyenv to Uv (224 points | 121 comments)
10. The political economy of Manus AI (15 points | 2 comments)
11. Tell Mozilla: it's time to ditch Google (301 points | 316 comments)
12. Three Implementation Models for Scheme (1987) [pdf] (27 points | 1 comment)
13. The Night Watch (2013) [pdf] (109 points | 19 comments)
14. A GS-Cache Inference Framework for Large-Scale Gaussian Splatting Models (12 points | 1 comment)
15. The city that forgot itself (11 points | 3 comments)
16. Reverse engineering OpenAI code execution to make it run C and JavaScript (216 points | 55 comments)
17. Shenmue (1999) reverse engineering reveals possible sun position oversight (133 points | 50 comments)
18. Peer-to-peer file transfers in the browser (455 points | 210 comments)
19. The Future Is Niri (333 points | 173 comments)
20. The insecurity of telecom stacks in the wake of Salt Typhoon (278 points | 175 comments)
21. The cultural divide between mathematics and AI (191 points | 119 comments)
22. Gemma 3 Technical Report [pdf] (420 points | 221 comments)
23. I use Cursor daily - here's how I avoid the garbage parts (179 points | 181 comments)
24. 'Uber for nurses' exposes 86K+ medical records, PII via open S3 bucket (192 points | 114 comments)
25. Apple has locked me in the same cage Microsoft's built for Windows 10 users (154 points | 170 comments)
26. Zinc, a systems programming language prototype (105 points | 33 comments)
27. I stopped everything and started writing C again (288 points | 295 comments)
28. My stupid noise journey (2023) (117 points | 138 comments)
29. Open-UI: Maintain an open standard for UI and promote its adherence and adoption (299 points | 95 comments)
30. I Built a Mechanical Calculator [video] (75 points | 21 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 13, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
